channel.title: Debugging on Tategoto Azarasi
channel.description: Recent content in Debugging on Tategoto Azarasi

item.title: Reproducing RetinaSim on an HPC Cluster
item.description: A detailed account of reproducing the complex multi-language biomedical simulation project RetinaSim on a high-performance computing (HPC) cluster, covering every technical detail from debugging compilation errors to adapting to headless rendering environments.

item.title: Discovering a Delete-Your-Files-and-Run Level Bug in debtap
item.description: A deep-dive investigation into the Arch Linux tool debtap reveals how a well-intentioned typo fix accidentally activated a catastrophic rm -rf bug that deleted all files in the current working directory.
